skillTree.name: Barded Nightmare
skillTree.description: Mannfred can ride an armoured steed of defiled flesh and bone; such an abominable horse is known as a 'Nightmare'.

skillTree.name: Hellsteed
skillTree.description: Hellsteeds are winged Nightmares. Mannfred may ride such an impressive creature to the horror of his foes.

skillTree.name: Zombie Dragon
skillTree.description: The corpse of a Dragon born aloft on tattered wings and evil sorcery - a fitting mount for the Lord of Vampires.

skillTree.name: Loremaster, Lore of Death
skillTree.description: None know better the secrets of Shyish, the Wind of Death, than those who have mastered its Lore.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Death spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Fate of Bjuna"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Soulblight Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Purple Sun of Xereus Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Loremaster, Lore of Vampires
skillTree.description: This one is no apprentice in the black arts but a master of Necromancy and Dark Magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Vampires spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Invocation of Nehek Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

skillTree.name: Practiced Caster
skillTree.description: Uncounted years of unlife have trained Mannfred's body and soul towards arcane perfection.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Worthy Master
skillTree.description: When Mannfred summons great warriors from beyond the grave, they seem unusally eager to serve.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Grave Guard, Black Knight and Blood Knight units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Grave Guard and Black Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Grave Guard and Black Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Strategic Brutality
skillTree.description: By rending the countryside in twain, we flush enemy agents out of their pitiful hiding spots.

effects.description:
Assassinate action: Additional 10% success chance
	(Heroes in local province)

skillTree.name: Guile of the Night
skillTree.description: Nothing of value escape's Mannfred's keen gaze, for he knows the power that can be harnessed in the trinkets and magic items of the world.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +25%

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -10
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Unending Ambition
skillTree.description: Mannfred's reach grows ever more terrifying as conquered lands fester in his wake. Even the older races take precautions against this threat.

skillTree.name: Dark Shepherd
skillTree.description: In a land saturated with blood, there are always fallen sheep ready to serve.

skillTree.name: Skeletal Minions
skillTree.description: This one maintains a large host of lowly skeletons.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Skeleton Warriors and Skeleton Spearmen
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Carrion Swarms
skillTree.description: Carrion follow this army, eager for fresh food.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: -10% for enemy armies starting their turn in this province
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Student of the Dark Arts
skillTree.description: Learning to master Dark Magic is a long, difficult road. This one has taken the first steps.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Dark Knight
skillTree.description: "See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."

skillTree.name: Beguile
skillTree.description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"

skillTree.name: Quickblood
skillTree.description: The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Curse of the Revenant
skillTree.description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Necromancer Supreme
skillTree.description: Few in the Old World have perfected necromantic spells the way Mannfred von Carstein has.

skillTree.name: Lord of Darkness
skillTree.description: Mannfred's time toiling in the libraries of Nehekara has rendered him a master of magical lore.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

skillTree.name: The Unliving Host
skillTree.description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call of the Night
skillTree.description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

effects.description:
Armour: +3 for Fell Bats units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +3% for Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Evil Souls
skillTree.description: Such evil spirits are desperate to spill mortal blood, and will speed along until they find some flesh to carve.

effects.description:
Magic resistance: 5% for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 10% for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Hexwraiths, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Night
skillTree.description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs, Zombie Dragon and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs, Zombie Dragon and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs, Zombie Dragon and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Crypt Horrors, Vargheists, Varghulfs, Zombie Dragon and Terrorgheist units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Waking Dead
skillTree.description: Vampires summon forth the gruesome remains of the ancient dead to bolster the masses of lesser minions under their control.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Carriages of Death
skillTree.description: By their very nature, most Vampires try to avoid discomfort and travel in style.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +5 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Legions of Dead
skillTree.description: "…and the legions of the dead envoked all hell upon the world."

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Zombies, Skeletons, Grave Guard, Cairn Wraiths and Spirit Hosts units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dread Knights
skillTree.description: The Undead Lord has followed the warrior's path to its ultimate conclusion, in a dark mockery of a Knight's vow.

effects.description:
Ward save: 5% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Black Coach, Black Knights, Blood Dragon Warriors, Blood Knights, Corpse Cart, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Deadly Power
skillTree.description: The power of death cannot be denied.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Crypt Ghouls, Crypt Horrors, Dire Wolves and Varghulfs units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Flying Horrors
skillTree.description: The Dark Magic-user can take to the skies, defying gravity by metamorphosing into a bat.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +15% for Fell Bats, Zombie Dragon, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Fell Bats, Zombie Dragon, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Fell Bats, Zombie Dragon, Terrorgheist and Vargheists units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -4%
	(Heroes in local region)

Upkeep: -2% for Lords and Heroes
	(Lord's army)

Hero action cost: -8%
	(Heroes in local region)

Upkeep: -4% for Lords and Heroes
	(Lord's army)

Hero action cost: -12%
	(Heroes in local region)

Upkeep: -8% for Lords and Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -2% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -4% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -8% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

skillTree.name: Uncanny Prescience
skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Count
backgroundSkills.description: "My people will feast on your bones."

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 when fighting against Men
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Earthing
backgroundSkills.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

backgroundSkills.name: Magical Reserves
backgroundSkills.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.
